Important message from Senior Management Team
Dear colleagues and students,
In view of the latest transportation services update, all classes at HKU today, Monday November 11, are cancelled.
Students and staff who are affected by traffic disruptions do not need to come to campus and are reminded to put their personal safety first.
Those who are already on campus should stay in a safe place until they can make appropriate travel arrangements.
During this period, we are adopting a flexible approach. Heads of departments and units should decide whether or not to cancel any other scheduled activities, taking into consideration the ongoing situation and the nature of the activities.
We will continue to monitor and assess the situation daily, and will post updates to the University’s FaceBook page, HKU App and HKU Portal and website as appropriate and send bulk emails as necessary.
Senior Management Team

Important message from the Senior Management Team

Dear students,

In view of the uncertain and unsafe traffic conditions for travelling to HKU, we are suspending classes on the Main Campus for the rest of the semester and making teaching and learning accessible online. This will enable students to stay away from campus, and even leave Hong Kong should they wish, while at the same time completing their courses and assessments.

Individual instructors will upload to Moodle detailed arrangements for course delivery and assessment. Examinations will be moved online or replaced by alternative forms of assessment. Details will be circulated in the next few days.

For help with travel arrangements out of Hong Kong, non-local students are advised to contact either the China Affairs Office or the International Affairs Office.

好合理

上面有人提起stat 75%考試，當有個course exam佔75% assignment佔25%，一開始講好咗係咁，有人放棄assignment諗住齋考exam

如果調高assignment做十成，唔考exam等於收人皮，你可以話有assignment唔做係戇鳩，懶就抵死快啲late drop算，但實情就係一開始大家講好咗weighting係點自然有人作出相應決擇，既然每個人嘅決擇唔同，講好weighting再改已經交咗嘅coursework weighting梗係唔公平

你話淨返75%唔知點，咁應該係而家傾完點點點之後學生再喺given同一資料之下一齊做決擇先算公平，而唔係改啲已經交咗嘅嘢，停課無得揀，咁調高已交coursework weighting都無得揀
